body:
Sure @aaroey,

Would it be better to prepare a separate PR for this? This script is not meant to be used as an automated test but a interactive test to see if everything functioning as expected. Proper testing would be more complicated. I think we can do another PR for test version of this and add subsequent tests in later PRs. Does this sound good?
